basic_info.description: I am responsible for developing apps and websites. For back-end, I mainly use Node js. Besides gaining further experience in Angular and Node js, I am also working on extending my front-end skills in React.I am also experienced in graphic design and video editing. I am using Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Premiere Pro for graphic design and video editing.

projects.title: Basic Html, CSS, js Portfolio
projects.description: Basic portfolio made in html, css and js. Cool thing about this portfolio is that it's fully responsive and it's using css grid.

projects.title: TO-DO App
projects.description: Prepare front-end implementation in Angular 12 for modified API made in Node js. App will be used to manage tasks and projects. It will be possible to add, edit and delete tasks and projects. App will also have a calendar that will show tasks that are planned for a specific day.

projects.title: Resume Builder
projects.description: Resume builder app made in React. App allows user to create resume by filling in the form. After filling the form, user can download resume in PDF format. App is using React-HTML-PDF library to generate PDF file.

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.description: Front-end implementation of Amazon website. It's possible to add products to basket and checkout. App is using Firebase for authentication and database.

projects.title: Chat App
projects.description: Chat app made using html, css, node js and socket.io. It's possible to create rooms and chat with other users.

projects.title: Examify
projects.description: Examify provides access to past questions and materials, user sign-up and login, profile creation and editing, test modules for various entrance exams, progress tracking, informative blogs, and a logout feature to help students achieve academic success.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I have experience in building websites and web applications. I can build a website from scratch or use a framework like React or Angular.

services.title: Wordpress Development
services.description: I have experience in building websites using Wordpress. I can build a website from scratch or use a theme.

services.title: API Development
services.description: I have experience in building REST APIs using Node js and Express js. I can build an API from scratch or use a framework like Express js.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: I have experience in graphic design. I can design logos, banners, flyers, business cards, etc.

services.title: Landing Page
services.description: I have experience in building landing pages. I can build a landing page from scratch or use a framework like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.

services.title: Typing Jobs
services.description: I have experience in typing jobs. I can type from PDF to Word, Excel, etc. I can also do copy typing.

testimonials.description: Gaurav is an exceptional developer! He built a stunning website for my business using his expertise in Node.js and Angular. His attention to detail and ability to understand my requirements were impressive. I highly recommend him for any web development project.
testimonials.name: Andy Collins

testimonials.description: I had the pleasure of working with Gaurav on a graphic design project, and I was amazed by his creativity and skills. He brought my ideas to life using Adobe Photoshop, delivering outstanding designs that exceeded my expectations. I will definitely hire him again for future design projects.
testimonials.name: Linda Richards

testimonials.description: Gaurav is a reliable WordPress developer who helped me create a professional and user-friendly website. He understood my vision and implemented various custom features seamlessly. His expertise in WordPress development ensured a smooth and efficient process. I'm extremely satisfied with the end result.
testimonials.name: Marta Coleman

testimonials.description: I approached Gaurav for video editing services, and he did an excellent job! With his expertise in Adobe Premiere Pro, he transformed my raw footage into a polished and visually appealing video. His attention to detail, timely delivery, and professionalism made the entire experience enjoyable. I highly recommend him for any video editing needs.
testimonials.name: Daniel Russell
